      Method to add course in database
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course Code
      studentId - Student Id
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the course is added successfully
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a error occurs while accessing the database

    • dropCourse

      boolean dropCourse(int courseCode, int studentId) throws SQLException, CourseNotFoundException
      Drop Course selected by student
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course Code
      studentId - Student Id
      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the course is dropped successfully
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if course does not exists
      SQLException - If a error occurs while accessing the database
